rules.text: Be nice, have fun and connect.
Don’t pretend to be someone you’re not.
Don’t make assumptions about gender, race, experience or ability.
Don’t post or repost anything illegal.
Add to the conversation and exchange views but don’t get into arguments.
Mind your manners. Don’t swear or use offensive language.
Bullies (and trolls) will be banned. This community is a safe place.
Listen to each other's stories and experiences.
